author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CENTER OF BERYL MOVING ACROSS THE NORTHWESTERN CARIBBEAN SEA... ...STRONG WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED ON THE COAST OF THE YUCATAN PENINSULA OF MEXICO BY EARLY FRIDAY...
summary:
...CENTER OF BERYL MOVING ACROSS THE NORTHWESTERN CARIBBEAN SEA... ...STRONG WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED ON THE COAST OF THE YUCATAN PENINSULA OF MEXICO BY EARLY FRIDAY...
 As of 2:00 PM EDT Thu Jul 4
 the center of Beryl was located near 19.2, -83.4
 with movement WNW at 18 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 974 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Beryl (AT2/AL022024)
